info.title: Type Services - Services to manage and view Types
info.description:
**All calls expect the following headers:**
| Header | Value | Required | Methods | |--------|-------|----------|---------| | Authorization | CWSAuth bearer=[bearer token] | true | All | | Citrix-CustomerId | [customer id] | true | All | | Accept | \*/\*, application/*, application/json | true | GET, PUT, POST, PATCH | | Accept-Charset | UTF-8 | false | GET, PUT, POST, PATCH | | Content-Type | application/json, charset=UTF-8 | true | PUT, POST, PATCH |

parameters.name: Citrix-CustomerId
parameters.description: The customer's Citrix Cloud ID. This value is sent as a request header.

401.description: Unauthorized - The Citrix bearer token is missing, invalid, or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The user associated with the bearer token does not have the required privileges to perform this operation.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type - The 'Content-Type' header was missing or specified something other than 'application/json; charset=utf-8'.

406.description: Not Acceptable - The 'Accept' header specified something other than 'application/json' or the 'Accept-Charset' header specified something other than 'utf-8'.

get.summary: Get a list of templates from an appliance[JP1].
get.description:
This operation returns the list of available image templates from the specified appliance.
            
The responses is cached for performance reasons.
            
#### Paging ####

If there are too many items to return in one response, a single page of data is
returned along with an opaque continuation token. This token should be sent with the next request
in order to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: Citrix-CustomerId
parameters.description: The customer's Citrix Cloud ID. This value is sent as a request header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page. If this field [JP2]is not specified, the page size defaults to 100 items.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: An opaque continuation token returned from a previous call. If this field is not specified, then the first page is returned.

401.description: Unauthorized - The Citrix bearer token is missing, invalid, or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The user associated with the bearer token does not have the required privileges to perform this operation.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type - The 'Content-Type' header was missing or specified something other than the expected 'application/json; charset=utf-8'.

406.description: Not Acceptable - The 'Accept' header specified something other than 'application/json' or the 'Accept-Charset' header specified something other than 'utf-8'.

pageSize.description: The number of items returned in this page.

items.description: The array of items returned in this page.

continuationToken.description:
An opaque continuation token passed to the next query
in order to get the next page of items. If this value is null, this is the last page.

pollingToken.description:
An opaque token that used on the next call to retrieve only those items that were modified since this call was made.
This might not be supported by all controllers.
